short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to make it easy to visit Lemmy communities from kbin.social

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find it annoying to copy paste `!memes@lemmy.world` to look at a Lemmy community? This extension is for you.

This extension looks for Lemmy style communities and replaces them to direct you to seeing that community on your kbin/lemmy instance.

It also works on every website! Not just on your main instance.

This extension looks for Lemmy style community mentions (!communityname@lemmy.word) and replaces them with a link to direct you to seeing that community on your Kbin or Lemmy instance.
